synopsis.text: She's a vampire, he's a secret-spiller - welcome to the topsy-turvy world of Asahi Kuromine and Youko Shiragami in "Jitsu wa Watashi wa." When Asahi, an ordinary high school student with an extraordinary inability to keep secrets, stumbles upon his crush Youko's true identity as a half-vampire, his life takes a supernatural turn. To protect her and keep her in school, Asahi promises to keep her secret, despite his chronic inability to do so. As if this wasn't challenging enough, more otherworldly beings join the mix, testing Asahi's resolve to keep their identities under wraps. Amidst the chaos, Asahi navigates through his newfound friendships and the trials they bring, all while trying to capture Youko's heart. Will Asahi manage to keep his lips sealed and win the girl, or will his secret-spilling tendencies spell disaster for his supernatural friends? Join Asahi on his thrilling, romantic, and comedic journey in "Jitsu wa Watashi wa."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
